title: What is the English translation of the song “Bekhayali” from Kabir Singh? - Quora

response.answer_text: Thanks for the A2A, This is the lyrics for the song Bekhayali with English translation: Bekhayali Mein Bhi Tera Hi Khayaal AayeEven in times when I have no thoughts, I think about You(You are always there in my thoughts)Kyun Bichhadna Hai Zaroori Yeh Sawaal AayeI keep on thinking why this separation between us is necessary/importantTeri Nazdeekiyon Ki Khushi Behisaab ThhiThe joy of You being close to me was indescribable/tremendous Hisse Mein Faasle Bhi Tere Bemisaal AayeIn my share, the separation from You also came in huge abundance Main Jo Tumse Door HoonAs I’m far away from YouKyun Door Main RahoonWhy should I remain like this?(Why shouldn’t I come closer to You?)Tera Guroor Hoon…I am Your pride Aa Tu Faasla MitaCome and eradicate these distancesTu Khwaab Sa MilaYou are like a dream that I have achievedKyun Khwaab Tod Doon Why should I break my own dream? Poetry is all about feelings. this song is full of feelings and emotions. such are rare songs to listen in history of Indian cinema. I am going to translate a few lines of the song. BEKHAYALI ME BHE TERA HE KHAYAL AE Thy thoughts never leave me even in unmindfullness. KIYUN BICHARNA HAI ZARORI YE SAWAL AE The only question is if our separation is justified. TERI NAZDEEKYON KI KHUSHI BE HISAB THI Whenever you were with me, I felt the joy beyond the boundaries. HISE ME FASLE BHI TERE BEMISAL AE Also, I felt the pain beyond the boundaries, whenever you were not with me ME JO TUM SE DOOR HON Since the day, you are away from me. KIYON DOOR ME RAHON I keep thinking if I should let you away from me. TERA GHROOR HON You were proud of me. AA TU FASLA MITA Come and reunite.
